briefdescription.para: Constructor for QgsLayoutRuler, with the specified parent widget and orientation.
Returns the current layout view associated with the ruler.
Returns the ruler size (either the height of a horizontal ruler or the width of a vertical rule).
Sets a context menu to show when right clicking occurs on the ruler.
Sets the current layout view to synchronize the ruler with.

detaileddescription.para: This is usually the transform set for a view showing the associated scene, in order to synchronize the view's display of the scene with the rulers.

briefdescription.para: Updates the position of the marker showing the current mouse position within the view.
Is emitted when mouse cursor coordinates change.
Draw a guide marker on the ruler.
Draw current marker pos on ruler.
Draws vertical text on a painter.

memberdef.argsstring: (QPainter *painter, double startPos, int numDivisions, double rulerScale, double maxPos=0)
memberdef.name: drawSmallDivisions

detaileddescription.para: Starting at startPos in mm, for numDivisions divisions, with major division spacing of rulerScale (in mm) Stop drawing if position exceeds maxPos

briefdescription.para: Returns the closest guide to a local ruler point, or nullptr if no guides are within the acceptable tolerance of the point.
Calculate the number of small divisions for each ruler unit, ensuring that they are sufficiently spaced.
Calculates the optimum labeled units for ruler so that labels are a good distance apart.
A custom ruler widget for use with QgsLayoutView, displaying the current zoom and position of the visible layout and for interacting with guides in a layout.
